name: Z-Psychic Examination
effect: This Move is resisted with the Foe's Defense instead of its Sp. Defense. The User gains High Critical when targeting the foe. Deal 2 Damage at the end of each Round for 4 Rounds.
description: Silvius materialises tools for a very thorough and rushed investigation of the foe's body for his Pokemon Index. He learns their weak spots in the qutie painful process.
